hero.badge: Where Real Farms Meet Digital Investing
hero.description: Invest in real Indonesian farms and watch actual crops grow. Our game-like platform makes agricultural investing simple, transparent, and fun—backed by real harvests, real profits.

about.title: About OwnaFarm
about.subtitle: Your Safe Gateway to Agricultural Wealth
about.description: Think farming is complicated? Not anymore. OwnaFarm connects you with real Indonesian farms in a way that's simple, transparent, and actually fun. Watch exactly where your money goes, see real crops grow, and harvest real profits—all backed by actual farms and guaranteed buyers.
about.forInvestorsDesc: Put money into verified farms, watch crops grow in real-time, and harvest rewards when the produce sells. It's investing made simple.
about.forFarmersDesc: Get the funding you need, connect with guaranteed buyers, and use professional monitoring tools to scale your farm.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Four Simple Steps to Start Growing
howItWorks.step1Desc: Sign up in under a minute. No crypto wallet, no blockchain knowledge needed. Just your email.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Browse real farms growing real crops in Indonesia. Find one you like, check the details, pick your investment amount.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Track your crops through live cameras and sensors. Watch them grow in real-time through our game-style dashboard. It's like FarmVille, but your profits are real.
howItWorks.step4Desc: When crops sell to our partner buyers, you get paid your share automatically. Simple as that.
howItWorks.farmerStep1Desc: Quick sign-up and verification to build trust with potential investors. We confirm your farm and identity.
howItWorks.farmerStep2Desc: Upload photos, share your story, list what you're growing. Help investors see why your farm is worth supporting.
howItWorks.farmerStep3Desc: Receive capital from investors worldwide who want to support Indonesian agriculture and earn returns.
howItWorks.farmerStep4Desc: Grow your crops, sell to our guaranteed buyer partners, and get paid on time—every time.

features.title: Why Choose OwnaFarm
features.subtitle: Safe, Simple, and Actually Fun
features.feature1Desc: Complete transparency. Watch exactly where your money goes, how it's used, and when it comes back to you.
features.feature2Desc: Check on your crops 24/7 with live camera feeds and real sensors. Your investment, visible anytime.
features.feature3Desc: No confusing crypto terms. Our game-style interface makes investing feel fun and approachable—but the profits are 100% real.
features.feature4Desc: Your money supports actual Indonesian farms growing real crops. Major food companies like Indofood buy the harvests, guaranteeing real demand.
features.feature5Desc: When crops sell, you earn your share instantly. No forms, no delays, no hassle.
features.feature6Desc: Beautiful dashboards show crop progress, farm health, and your earnings in real-time. Always know how you're doing.

cta.title: Ready to Grow Your Wealth?
cta.description: Join thousands of digital farmers and farm owners already earning from real agriculture. Simple, safe, and transparent.

footer.description: Agricultural investing made simple. Connect with real Indonesian farms, watch crops grow, and harvest real profits.

registerFarm.pageDescription: Join OwnaFarm and access funding from investors worldwide. Complete the registration process to get started.

success.title: Registration Submitted!
success.description: Thank you for registering with OwnaFarm. Our team will review your application and contact you within 2-3 business days.

error.generic: Failed to submit registration. Please try again.
error.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
error.validation: Please check your form for errors and try again.
error.server: Server error. Please try again later.
error.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.

businessInfo.cropsDescription: Select the crops you have experience growing

errors.bankAccountNumber: Account number must be at least 10 digits
errors.bankAccountName: Please enter the account holder name
errors.yearsOfExperience: Please enter your years of experience
errors.cropsExpertise: Please select at least one crop

documents.ktpPhotoDesc: Clear photo of your ID card (max 5MB)

documents.npwpPhotoDesc: Photo or scan of your NPWP (max 5MB)

review.title: Review Your Information
review.description: Please verify all information before submitting
review.termsAgreement: I agree to the OwnaFarm Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. I confirm that all information provided is accurate and I authorize OwnaFarm to verify my documents.

errors.terms: Please agree to the terms and conditions

admin.pageDescription: Review and manage farmer business proposals. Approve promising ventures or reject submissions that don't meet criteria.

1.description: Traditional rice farming using organic methods. Looking to expand operations and improve irrigation systems for better yield.

2.description: Organic vegetable farming specializing in leafy greens and tomatoes. Seeking funding for greenhouse construction.

3.description: Arabica coffee plantation in the highlands. Need support for processing equipment and certification for export.

4.description: Mixed fruit orchard with mangoes, rambutans, and durians. Planning to implement drip irrigation and organic pest control.

5.description: Cattle and goat farming with focus on sustainable practices. Looking to expand breeding program and improve facilities.

6.description: Cultivating traditional Indonesian herbs and spices including turmeric, ginger, and lemongrass for local and export markets.

7.description: Freshwater fish farming specializing in tilapia and catfish. Need investment for pond expansion and water filtration systems.

8.description: Commercial flower farming with roses, chrysanthemums, and orchids. Seeking support for climate-controlled greenhouse.

9.description: Large-scale corn production using modern farming techniques. Looking to implement precision agriculture technology.

10.description: Indoor mushroom cultivation focusing on oyster and shiitake varieties. Need funding for climate control and substrate preparation.
